core.fail: ^cFailed to transition to the next core phase!

monument.fail: ^cFailed to transition to the next monument phase!

kits.medic-description: Heal you and your teammates using Health Potions.
kits.bunny-description: Gain Jump boost and speed to avoid your opponents
kits.alchemist-description: Use the power of potions and debuff opponents
kits.pyromancer-description: Throw fire and deal fire damage to anyone you hit.
kits.mortician-description: The Undead will serve you by attacking your foes.
kits.ninja-description: Become invisible and strike enemies from behind
kits.trainer-description: Spawn the pack and deal more damage than the ordinary swordsman!
kits.golem-description: Knock enemy players away from you and your team!
kits.shamon-description: Raise health levels of you and your teammates
kits.barbarian-description: Ender pearl into the enemy base and sneak up from behind!
kits.marauder-description: Projectiles will not scratch you and with the extra 10 hearts
kits.witch-description: Give Speed and Fire Resistance to anyone that needs it!
kits.lumberjack-description: Deal Heavy damage and with Haste, nothing will stand in your way.
kits.builder-description: Build with blocks to help defend your team's base.
kits.wizard-description: Use magical spells on your enemy.
kits.poseidon-description: Work and fight below the water.
kits.scout-description: Chase your opponents at lightning speed.
kits.warrior-description: Be ready to pvp against others.
kits.cannoner-description: Be a tnt expert and blow up the other side.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Snipe your foes from long distances!

fireman.name: Fireman
fireman.description: Put out fires with your water!

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description: Heal you and your friends with your health potions!

beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
beastmaster.description: Fight with your mini army by your side!

cactus.name: Cactus
cactus.description: Prickle your enemies to death with your spikey thorns!

cook.name: Cook
cook.description: Eat your way through your enemies!

broadcasts.map-kits: This map has kits enabled! Use /kit to select your kit.
broadcasts.region-monument: You must destroy the whole monument region to win!
broadcasts.map-kits-2: To Look at kits, do /kits and to select kits, do /kit kitname!
broadcasts.potion-teleport: ^c^lDrink ^a^lpotions ^c^lto teleport and find the ^a^ljukebox ^c^lto find better items
broadcasts.wool-safeties: ^cWool safeties are ^4^lenabled ^cand wool will respawn in chests every ^4^l5 minutes.

errors.cannot-build-map: In dieser Map kannst du nicht bauen.
errors.cannot-build-hill: Um den Hügel herum kannst du nicht bauen.
errors.cannot-break-enchanting: You cannot break the enchantment table.
errors.outside-map: Dir ist es nicht erlaubt außerhalb der Map zubauen.
errors.enemy-base: Du darfst die Basis der Gegner nicht betreten oder verändern.
errors.own-wool-room: You may not enter your own wool room!
errors.wrong-scorebox: Du kannst die Punktebox nicht betreten.
errors.spawn-restricted: Spawn-Bereiche können Bau und/oder Eintritts Einschränkungen aufweisen.
errors.height-limit: You have reached the height limit of the map.

tutorial.you-are-spectating: You are spectating the match. You can use "/join" to participate.
tutorial.how-to-back: Left-click to go to the previous slide.
tutorial.how-to-exit: Type any command to quit the tutorial.
tutorial.free-for-all: This map is a free for all.
tutorial.capture-the-flag: This map is a capture the flag gamemode.
tutorial.destroy-the-monument: This map is a destroy gamemode.
tutorial.frenzy: This map is an elimination gamemode.
tutorial.skywars: This map is a Sky Wars gamemode.
tutorial.koth: This map is a king of the hill gamemode.
tutorial.arcade: This map is an arcade gamemode.
tutorial.capture-the-wool: This map is a Capture the Wool gamemode.

generic.team-spawns: Teams spawn on their side of the map, in this area.

dtm.title: Destroy The Monument
dtm.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6Destroy the Monument ^6^l(DTM) ^6map!
dtm.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3break all or a majority of the other team's monuments.
dtm.desc3: ^7A ^omonument ^7is a ^lblock or set of blocks that must be destroyed. ^7You will be teleported to one shortly.
dtm.colored: You must destroy the monuments with the same color as your team.
dtm.monument-area: The monuments are located in areas like this.
dtm.monument-region: The monuments are located in regions that require you to break a majority of this block type.
dtm.monument-objective: Destroy the opposing team's monument(s) to win the match for your team!
dtm.collect-emeralds-dtm: Collect emeralds by killing players and trade it in for neat stuff!
dtm.rare-location: If you find a rare location like this, step into the redstone square to get a rare item!

ctf.capture-area: You must reach an area like this on the other side of the map to retrieve the flag.
ctf.capture-point: This point holds the flag, capture the flag(s) to win the match for your team!

ctw.title: Capture The Wool
ctw.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6Capture the Wool ^6^l(CTW) ^6map!
ctw.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3take colored wool(s) from the enemy team's base and return them to yours.
ctw.desc3: ^7A ^owool ^7is the ^l"flag" your team must capture from the enemy team. ^7You will be teleported to where you will find wools shortly.
ctw.wool-area: You must reach an area like this on the other side of the map to retrieve the wool.
ctw.wool-chest: This chest contains a supply of wool that you must add to your inventory and return to your side of the map.
ctw.wool-monument: Place the wool(s) in your team wool monument in order to win the match for your team!
ctw.enderbow: Shoot your bow to travel to other platforms
ctw.collect-string: You must reach this platform to recieve string. String spawns every 10 seconds
ctw.dye-color: You must reach this platform to recieve dye. Find the other platforms to recieve the other dyes
ctw.craft-wool: Craft your wool by using four pieces of string and any dye
ctw.drop-wool: You cannot drop wool! If you craft it, you hold the burden to capture it!

koth.title: King of the Hill
koth.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6King of the Hill ^6^l(KOTH) ^6map!
koth.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3obtain points by controlling the hill(s) scattered around the map
koth.desc3: ^7A ^ohill ^7is where your ^lteam must stand in order to claim points.
koth.desc4: ^lIt will change color depending on who controls it. ^7You will be teleported to one shortly.
koth.hill-area: You must reach an area like this on the map, and you must stand in these areas in order to capture them.
koth.hill-area-permanent: You must reach an area like this on the map and you must stand in these areas in order to capture them. You can only capture them once.
koth.hill-area-depreciated: You must reach an area like this on the map and you must stand in these areas in order to capture them. If you move out of the area, then you will lose control of the hill.

dtc.title: Destroy The Core
dtc.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6Destroy the Core ^6^l(DTC) ^6map!
dtc.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3leak the lava out of the opposing team's core.
dtc.desc3: ^7A ^ocore ^7is a ^lset of blocks surrounding a lava center that must be broken in order to make the lava leak out. ^7You will be teleported to one shortly.
dtc.core-leak: ^7This is the obsidian core, leak the lava inside to win!

tdm.title: Team Deathmatch
tdm.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6Team Deathmatch ^6^l(TDM) ^6map!
tdm.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3obtain points by killing opposing players.
tdm.desc3: ^7Opposing players ^lwill try to fight back so make sure to get them before they get you!

tnt.title: This map has ^4^lTNT
tnt.desc1: ^7Please be aware that caught team griefing with ^4^lTNT ^7will result in ^4^lpunishments!
tnt.desc2: ^4^lTNT ^7can be used to destroy enemy monuments and cores.

dtc-dtm.title: Mixed: DTC & DTM
dtc-dtm.desc1: ^7You are about to play a ^6Mixed Map ^7with ^6^lDTC ^7and ^6^lDTM ^3gamemodes^7!
dtc-dtm.desc2: ^7The goal of this map is to ^3leak the lava out of the opposing team's core and ^3break all or a majority of the other team's monuments.
dtc-dtm.desc3: ^7A ^ocore ^7is a ^lset of blocks surrounding a lava center that must be broken in order to make the lava leak out. ^7You will be teleported to one shortly.

walls.title: Gamemode: Walls
walls.desc2: ^7The goal is to prepare yourself and be ready for battle.
walls.desc3: ^7You need to wait for the walls to fall to start the battle.
walls.wall-area: ^7The wall is located in this area and looks like this.
walls.wall-mid-loot: ^7In the middle you will find some loot to improve your equipment.

errors.cannot-destroy-wall: You may not destroy the wall!
